overview: The gospel hasn’t changed. Christ’s command to make disciples hasn’t changed. But there has been a foundational shift in our culture. In this new DVD—shot live at our recent pastors’ conference—Ken Ham teaches from Acts 2 and Acts 17 to show the difference between witnessing to “Jews” (people who have a basic understanding about God and creation) and witnessing to “Greeks” (people with virtually no knowledge of God’s Word). Discover how to be more effective in reaching the lost with the truth of the Gospel!
title: Gospel Reset
